text: - People are saying America's youth
is lost in a decadent lifestyle.

But at Parents for a Wholesome
America, we disagree,
so we've published these 50 pointers

to help you young people toward
a good, clean way of life.

Point one, fill up leisure
time with a wholesome hobby,
like learning a musical instrument.
(intense rock music)

♪ Trying so hard to keep
up with the Joneses ♪
♪ Running a rat race won by our noses ♪

♪ Always put one foot
in front of the other ♪

♪ And dance to the beat
of the decadent drummer ♪

♪ Just buy a brand new pair
of Fred Astaire shoes ♪
♪ Climbing to the top, never gonna stop ♪

♪ It's the same old song and
one two three and dec-a-dance ♪
♪ Dance, dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance, dance ♪
♪ Everybody decadancing ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance ♪
♪ Dance, dance ♪

♪ It's hard to stop once
the music gets started ♪

♪ 'Til the soles of your feet
harden up like your heart did ♪

♪ Stepping in line with
the sign of the timer ♪

♪ Seduced by the tune
of the decadent dancer ♪
♪ The decadent dancer ♪

♪ Just buy a brand new pair
of Fred Astaire shoes ♪
♪ Climbing to the top, never gonna stop ♪

♪ It's the same old song and
one two three and dec-a-dance ♪
♪ Dance, dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance, dance ♪
♪ Everybody decadancing ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance ♪
♪ Dance, dance ♪
(intense rock music continues)
♪ Dance, dance ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance, dance ♪
♪ Everybody decadancing ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance, dance ♪

♪ Dancing to the decadent
dance, dance, dance ♪
♪ Everybody decadancing ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance ♪
♪ Dancing to the decadent dance ♪
- Thank you for listening so carefully.

It just goes to prove that
you don't need a loud,

decadent spectacle to get
kids' attention these days.
(man sighing)
